Hey {name},
Are you tired of how long, tiring, and expensive any hiring process is? Is it affecting the quality of your workforce as a whole? Make it different with 2020Technologies! Find the next hire for {company} with minimal effort and amazing efficiency. At 2020Technologies, we've developed a P2P referral-based platform that connects job seekers with vacancies based on their skills, experience, and career goals. This is possible with our network of over 300+ trained freelance recruiters, who have hired across verticals for top firms such as Razorpay, Scaler Academy, boAt Lifestyle, OYO, Makemytrip, Tailweb Technologies.
